bibl.title: Il temenos di Messon: un contesto unico per Saffo e Alceo.
bibl.note: Alc. frr. 129-134 and Sappho fr. 17 V. may refer to the same performative context, a shire placed near the middle of Lesbos: this sanctuary near the sea and dedicated to Hera would have been the seat of a koinon between Lesbian cities. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Stefano Caciagli, Il temenos di Messon: un contesto unico per Saffo e Alceo.

Alc. frr. 129-134 and Sappho fr. 17 V. may refer to the same performative context, a shire placed near the middle of Lesbos: this sanctuary near the sea and dedicated to Hera would have been the seat of a koinon between Lesbian cities. - Avec résumé en anglais.
